featured.headline: Uber engineers built an AI version of their boss
featured.summary: Uber CEO Dara Khosrowshahi said the company’s employees have gone all in on AI, going so far as to build a chatbot of him that they use to practice their pitches....

secondary_1.headline: Anthropic won’t budge as Pentagon escalates AI dispute

secondary_2.headline: Google adds a way to create automated workflows to Opal
